title: Add comprehensive tech stack and component documentation
description:
Added detailed documentation to docs-site/architecture.md covering:

- Tech Stack: 11 core technologies with purposes
- Core Modules: 14 module categories (specs, orchestrator, dashboards, alerts, slos, etc.)
- CLI Commands: 20+ commands with exit codes for CI/CD
- Technology Templates: All 18+ templates documented with key metrics
- Integration Points: Environment variables and CI/CD flow

This gives developers a complete reference for understanding NthLayer internals.
